John_David_Kent:
{{Infobox musical artist | name = John David Kent | image = File:John David Kent Big Texas Spring May 3 2013.JPG | caption = John David Kent performs at Big Texas Dance Hall on Friday, May 3, 2013, in [[Spring, Texas|Spring, TX]]. | image_size = 250px | origin = [[Celeste, Texas]], [[Texas]], United States | genre = [[Country music|Country]], [[Texas Country]], [[Americana (music)|Americana]] | years_active = 2008â€“present | associated_acts = [[Radish (band)|Radish]] | website = http://www.johndavidkent.com | current_members = John David Kent (Vocals, Guitar),
Randall Fuller (Bass guitar, [[Harmony Vocals]])
Tony Kent (Drums, [[Harmony Vocals]])
Colton Gilbreath (Lead Guitar, [[Harmony Vocals]], [[Lead Fro]]) }} '''John David Kent''' is a [[Country music|country]] band based out of [[Celeste, Texas|Celeste]], [[Texas|TX]]. Consisting of John David Kent, also known as John Kent, formerly of the late 1990s post-grunge band [[Radish (band)|Radish]], and other [[North Texas]] natives Randall Fuller, Tony Kent, and Colton Gilbreath. == Background information== After John's stint recording and touring with Radish, [[Ben Kweller]], and [[The Lemonheads]], he relocated back to his hometown of Celeste, TX to form [[Blackland Records]] and open "The Vault" Recording Studio.[http://www.dallasobserver.com/2010-12-02/music/john-david-kent-and-the-dumb-angels-letting-the-true-artist-shine-through/ Dallas Observer: 12/02/2010] John began to write songs of his own and formed the band Pony League which is now defunct but then put together John David Kent. The band's self-titled first album, released on May 17, 2011, is available on iTunes. Their second album was released in 2013.[http://npgpr.com/client1.php?id=3&page=3 NPG Public Relations] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20110823105553/http://npgpr.com/client1.php?id=3&page=3 |date=2011-08-23 }} ==Discography== * [https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/john-david-kent/id437086942 ''John David Kent'' (2009, Blackland Records)] * [https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/before-the-sun-comes-up/id708442429 ''Before The Sun Comes Up'' (2013, Roustabout Records/Blackland Records)] ==External links== * [https://web.archive.org/web/20110805231230/http://www.cmt.com/artists/az/john_david_kent_and_the_dumb_angels/artist.jhtml Official CMT Page] ==References== {{Authority control}} {{DEFAULTSORT:John David Kent}} [[Category:Country music groups from Texas]] [[Category:People from Celeste, Texas]]
